segments.text: Wow ! What ’ s the hold up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s probably just people trying to get an early start out of the city for the weekend . Nobody sticks around in the summer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? Then , I guess I won ’ t have a hard time finding a room or getting a cab ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , you might because there ’ s a big convention in town this weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m not too worried about it . I always seem to find something .
segments.speaker: S1
